About me

I am a dynamic individual with numerous years of professional experience in the graphic design industry. My professional experience has assisted me in developing strong skills in web development, concept based illustrations, responsive layouts and printed layout designs such as magazines, books and posters. I am a self-motivated individual able to work under pressure and capable of multi-tasking with great attention to detail. I am a creative, sociable person that contributes to a pleasant and friendly work environment.
